comment: * @hide Only a subset of ICU is exposed in Android

methods.name: protected static void mixedMeasuresToMicros(ComplexUnitsConverter.ComplexConverterResult complexConverterResult, DecimalQuantity quantity, MicroProps outMicros)
methods.comment:
* Populates micros.mixedMeasures and modifies quantity, based on the values
     * in measures.

methods.name: public List<MeasureUnit> getOutputUnits()
methods.comment:
* Returns the list of possible output units, i.e. the full set of * preferences, for the localized, usage-specific unit preferences. *

* The returned pointer should be valid for the lifetime of the * UsagePrefsHandler instance.

methods.name: public MicroProps processQuantity(DecimalQuantity quantity)
methods.comment:
* Obtains the appropriate output value, MeasureUnit and * rounding/precision behaviour from the UnitsRouter. *

* The output unit is passed on to the LongNameHandler via * micros.outputUnit.

methodNames: protected static void mixedMeasuresToMicros(ComplexUnitsConverter.ComplexConverterResult complexConverterResult, DecimalQuantity quantity, MicroProps outMicros)
